translation: by Hukam, forms and beings come into existence
yet this Hukam cannot be stated or described
by Hukam, honor and greatness are obtained
by Hukam, some are high and some are low
by Hukam, pains and pleasures are written and experienced
for some, by Hukam, there is grace and blessing
for others, by Hukam, there is endless wandering
none at all is outside of Hukam. ||8||
